TEXT.TITLE: DOMINION RESOURCES <D> SEEKS RATE HIKE
TEXT.BODY: Dominion Resources Inc said it has asked the Virginia Corporation commission to approve fuel cost and base rate adjustments that would raise typical residential bills 1.4 pct, effective May One. It said it is seeking a one-year base rate reduction of 26.7 mln dlrs due to tax savings and a 67.5 mln dlr increase in fuel charges, for a net increase of 40.9 mln dlrs. Reuter
